name: Duergar Forgeworker

traits.name: Duergar Resilience
traits.desc: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Forge Hammer
actions.desc: A heavy hammer used for both metalwork and defense.

bio: These are the common laborers of the Cinderfork Foundry. They are strong and resilient from a lifetime of toil in the extreme heat, but lack the formal military training or advanced equipment of Duergar guards. They fight with the heavy hammers they use for their daily work, making them a dangerous obstacle in numbers.
